title: Class Switching
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is on the Scoreboard page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the MiLB class logo in the top center of the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then a pop over should appear and show 6 classes:
Triple-A
Double-A
Class A Advanced
Class A
Class A Short Season
Rookie
AND the currently selected class will have a check mark(iPad Only) and the name will be greyed out

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
And the user taps the MiLB logo displaying the class name on top center
And the user taps the Double-A cell in the pop over
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the app should switch from Triple-A to Double-A mode
And the pop over should dismiss
And the user should be left on the Scoreboard
And the schedule on the page should reflect the Double-A schedule for the given day.
REPEAT FOR ALL CLASSES

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
And the user taps the MiLB logo in the top center
And the user taps outside the class selection pop over.
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the pop over should dismiss
And the user should be left on the Scoreboard
And the schedule on the page should reflect the schedule for the day for the mode on which they were when they opened the pop over.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
And the user taps the MiLB logo in the top center
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the class mode which is currently active in the app should be clearly marked and visible. It should be immediately obvious to a first time user which mode is selected and which is deselected.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard
And the user taps the MiLB logo in the top center
And the user taps on one of the classes cell in the pop over
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's selection should be clearly indicated to the user so they are immediately aware that they cell they chose has been selected.
And the scoreboard should reflect the games for the mode the user has chosen.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to any section or page in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the only data they should see should reference Triple-A and teams in Triple-A, all logos that appear should belong to Triple-A teams. 
(Check: 
Scoreboard, News/Video (Filter), Standings, Teams, MiLB.TV )
*REPEAT FOR ALL CLASSES*
